Articles.Content:
***Do you ever feel like being the very best, like no one ever was?***

No matter what you're the best at, there is a record to be held for it! whether it be heaviest payload into orbit, fastest time to the Mun, or you're the best at torturing Kerbals, this is the place for you to shine.

Anyone can beat an existing record, or set a new one. but there are a few requirements for this:

1. The record must be measurable. It cannot be 'best looking spaceship' as beauty is in the eye of the beholder, not the Geiger counter.
2. there must only be one variable. We can judge 'fastest time to the Mun.' But not 'fastest time to the Mun with the largest ship.'
3. Craft files and screenshots(mainly the F3 screen)/videos(no craft needed here) are required for maximum chance of approval, along with instructions on how to re-create the record.{craft files can be uploaded through dropbox, or any other method, just Google: 'file sharing'}
4. No cheating. the record must be completed in a way that someone could beat it with a fresh game. No file editing.

 you cannot use mods that: 

- Control the craft
- add parts
- edit physics

\*Note that mods that increase aesthetics or performance are fine.

We encourage you to create your own records! here is the format needed for an entry:

**\*Name of Record\*** Example: (Heaviest Rocket)

**\*Record\*** Example: 500 Tonnes

**\*Version Achieved in\*** Example: 1

**\*Proof\***

Else:

**\*Craft File\***

**\*Re-Creation Instructions\***

Thank you for your Records, we really appreciate them.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> \*Name of Record\* Example: (Heaviest Rocket

Somebody please call Whackjob.

He's probably already on his way.

I bet I could win the most overengineered mission to duna award with my 0.25 6000t duna mission, where I landed a 300t ship on duna's surface (more of a launch platform, actually), but the craft files are long gone.

We got one.

After intensive search, we found

**The most similar-looking pair of kerbals**

**Name of Record :** Most similar-looking pair of kerbals

**Version Achieved in :** KSP 1.02

**Proof :**

[![904226KSPworldrecordmostsimilarlookingpairofkerbals01.jpg](http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/904226KSPworldrecordmostsimilarlookingpairofkerbals01.jpg)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=904226KSPworldrecordmostsimilarlookingpairofkerbals01.jpg)

**Re-Creation Instructions :** Examine every kerbal you can very closely.

**Name of record:** Biggest stock rocket. (absolute, as opposed to usable).

**Version achieved:** The first one with the SLS parts.

**Proof:**

![7TIIdHz.png](http://i.imgur.com/7TIIdHz.png)

No longer have the craft file. It wasn't a a usable rocket, unless you want a reliable way to make a computer freeze up.
